data.description:
Fun Fit Five is a VR fitness game where you will perform different movements to hit incoming projectiles while you exercise across different themed scenarios in different workouts.

**Start your fitness journey**

- Choose a workout from a growing library, with new ones being uploaded constantly!
- Track your progress with in-depth information and stay tuned with your improvement across your workout history
- Create your own Weekly Goals and raise the bar with customized steps and suggestions

**Challenge yourself**

- Execute multiple workout movements with our three Workout Types: Punch, Blades & Hit Back
- Try out our unique Workout Events and have an extra-challenge at selected workouts
- 360ยบ experience: select the regular one-direction workout or increase the level with full-circle movement
- Hit harder to score as many points you can get to the top of the leaderboard

**You in control**

- We have different scenarios available, with custom Hit Equipments & Projectiles. Play any workout, in any of them!
- Filter the workouts with different parameters so you can find the perfect one for you
- Rate your completed workouts and contribute with the general rating that is visible for all players
